title: Bruins notebook: Zdeno Chara nears return fron injury
text:
Published By: Boston Herald Bruins - Today 
WILMINGTON ­— Zdeno Chara may have reached the broken-record stage of his recovery from an upper body injury, but the Bruins captain did ...
